ModMetaData.name: [JDS] Star Wars Jango and Boba Fett
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This add Jango and Boba Fett Armor set from star wars moives
[h1]!!!!!!!!!Weapon are not included!!!!!!!!![/h1]
Note: no CE patch yet, This is just a Template and there are more to come.
[h1]Features:[/h1] -Jango Fett Armor Set -Boba Fett Armor Set
[h1]Crafting Requirements:[/h1] -Craftable -Research Requirements: PoweredArmor
[h1]Credits:[/h1] - Star Wars: Moives - [b]Pelador[/b] for add-on code for the Jetpack mod to use
